SEARCH
Module com.example.cincuentazo
Package com.example.cincuentazo.view.alert

Interface AlertBoxInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlertBox
public interface AlertBoxInterface
An interface for defining methods to display alert boxes and option dialogs in a JavaFX application.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    showAlert(String title, String header, String message, javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType)
    Displays a simple alert dialog with a title, header, message, and alert type.
    String
    showOptions(String title, String header, List<String> options)
    Displays a dialog with multiple options for the user to select from.

  • Method Details

    • showAlert

      void showAlert(String title, String header, String message, javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType)
      Displays a simple alert dialog with a title, header, message, and alert type.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the alert window.
      header - The header text for the alert. Can be null if no header is needed.
      message - The main content message for the alert.
      alertType - The type of alert to be displayed (e.g., INFORMATION, WARNING, ERROR, CONFIRMATION).

    • showOptions

      String showOptions(String title, String header, List<String> options)
      Displays a dialog with multiple options for the user to select from.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the dialog window.
      header - The header text for the dialog. Can be null if no header is needed.
      options - A list of options to be displayed as buttons.
      Returns:
      The text of the option selected by the user, or null if no option was chosen.
